channel.title: MOTY Players Choice
channel.description:
[url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa/features/moty-players-choice-upcoming[/url]
MOTY Players Choice @ ModDB, Black Mesa has been voted in but has been given an honorable mention for still being an 'upcoming' mod. [quote] Once again Black Mesa is an unstoppable vote recieving machine. However until BM releases forever an Honorable Mention. Still players are eagerly awaiting the release of this mod. Chop chop! [/quote] :frowning:

item.title: MOTY Players Choice
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
Are there actually any mods worth playing which have made it OUT of development?

I see endless mods which have been in development for the past 800 years and yet nothing which is actually playable (or worth playing)

The only one I play that was really an excellent mod is Oblivion Lost for STALKER.

Read full topic

item.title: MOTY Players Choice
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
I still can’t believe how amazing Cry of Fear looks for being on Goldsrc.

Read full topic

item.title: MOTY Players Choice

item.description:
Yay for Cry of Fear showing that the Goldsource engine is still awesome!

item.title: MOTY Players Choice
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
Because it’s an award for UPCOMING mods. Still, bm won twice so yeah.

item.title: MOTY Players Choice
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Sounds fair to me. How can you award a MOTY award for a mod that isn’t even out yet?

item.title: MOTY Players Choice
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa/features/moty-players-choice-upcoming

MOTY Players Choice @ ModDB, Black Mesa has been voted in but has been given an honorable mention for still being an ‘upcoming’ mod.

Once again Black Mesa is an unstoppable vote recieving machine. However until BM releases forever an Honorable Mention. Still players are eagerly awaiting the release of this mod. Chop chop!
